data.description_html:
This spell compels a creature up to 4 HD more than the caster's level to fight in a merciful manner.
Specifically, the creature deals nonlethal damage with its attacks, avoids using damaging spells or spell-like abilities, and does not deliver a coup de grace to a helpless foe.
Abstinence Component: You must not have dealt damage, by spell or any other means, to another living creature within the last 8 hours before casting this spell.
data.name: Yoke of Mercy
